#### July 2025 (v 2.0.0)

Chapters added:

```{r, results='asis'}
readxl::read_xlsx("data/contributors.xlsx", guess_max = 200) |> 
  filter(!is.na(id),
         version == "2.0.0") |> 
  mutate(line = str_c("- ", title, " (", author, ")\n")) |> 
  pull(line) |> 
  cat()
```
